tools_and_software.Description: Get unlimited homework help, revise for exams and perfect your writing with our best AI model. With Google AI Pro, your free upgrade includes access to Veo 3 Fast, Deep Research, NotebookLM and 2 TB free storage.

certifications_and_courses.Description: India's national MOOC platform with 13,235+ courses from IITs, IIMs, and universities. Free learning with optional certificates for ₹1000.

scholarships_and_fellowships.Description: 82,000 annual scholarships for students above 80th percentile in Class XII with family income under ₹8 lakhs. ₹12,000/year for first 3 years, ₹20,000 for 4th and 5th year.
1,00,000 fresh scholarships annually for students with parental income up to ₹1.5 lakh. Covers Classes IX-XII.
5,000 scholarships for J&K students. Tuition: ₹30,000 (general), ₹1.25 lakhs (engineering), ₹3 lakhs (medical) plus ₹1 lakh maintenance allowance.

scholarships_and_fellowships.Program Name: Indira Gandhi Single Girl Child Scholarship
scholarships_and_fellowships.Description: For single girl child below 30 years pursuing PG. ₹36,200/year for 2 years from UGC.

scholarships_and_fellowships.Program Name: UGC Merit Scholarship for University Rank Holders

For Masters and PhD in UK universities. Covers airfare, tuition, and living expenses.
